definition: to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
variant of 玩[wan2]/Taiwan pr. [wan4]
surname Wang
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
to rule/to reign over
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
player (of a game)/enthusiast (audio, model planes etc)
plaything/toy
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
to joke/joke/jest
to be playful/to be fond of one's fun
amusing/fun/interesting
to be playful/to be fond of one's fun
amusing/fun/interesting
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to play (as children do)/to amuse oneself
to play fast and loose with the law/to game the system/(leisure) rules of the game/way of doing an activity/(tourism) way of experiencing a place
antique/curio
to play/to have fun/to hang out
to neglect one's duty/dereliction of duty/malpractice
to play with/to toy with/to dally with/to engage in/to resort to
toy/plaything/thing/act/trick (in a performance, stage show, acrobatics etc)

sentences.english: The children are playing under the tree.
Eric Suen Yiu Wai and Chan Fa La felt embarrassed when they were playing heartbeat measurement.
sentences.chinese: 孙耀威和陈法拉玩量度心跳，都感尴尬。

sentences.english: I'm studying how to play with a yo-yo.
sentences.chinese: 我正在学习如何玩溜溜球。

sentences.english: Playing video games in the recreation facility.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们在娱乐室里玩电脑游戏。

sentences.english: This area is most suitable for growing wheat.
sentences.chinese: 现在去那两个温泉公园玩是最适宜了。

sentences.english: I like playing with a bubble gun. Can you buy one for me?
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢玩泡泡枪，可以给我买一把吗？

sentences.english: Football is played in all weathers, including rain and snow.
sentences.chinese: 可以在气候下玩橄榄球，包括雨天和雪天。

sentences.english: I often play puzzles and Legos at home.
sentences.chinese: 我经常在家玩猜谜游戏和玩积木。

sentences.english: I often play puzzles and Legos at home.
sentences.chinese: 我经常在家玩猜谜游戏和玩积木。

sentences.english: Playing computer games all day lavishes parents' hard-earned money.
sentences.chinese: 整天玩电脑游戏浪费父母的血汗钱。

sentences.english: THE old-fashioned financial system was like Old Maid, a parlour game once beloved of small children.
sentences.chinese: 老式的金融系统就象是小孩子喜欢玩的一种扑克牌。

sentences.english: My fatherwon the game. Then I played Scrabble.
On my first time I accidentally crashed into a snow boarder.
sentences.chinese: 第一次滑下来的时候我不小心撞上玩雪地滑板的人。

sentences.english: Eg:In college all the girls want to go out with jocks, the guys with muscles.
sentences.chinese: 大学女生都喜欢和那些身强体壮的帅气男生玩。

sentences.english: I hate to play a deep game.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌玩深奥难懂的游戏。

sentences.english: Jim was so engrossed in his computer games that he did not hear his mother call.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆埋头玩电脑游戏，一点都没有听到母亲的叫唤声。
